name: Dunwell
description:
Dunwell is a puzzle game set in the depths of a well. The protagonist's objective is to reach the bottom and rescue his sibling who fell down. However, the dangers of the well prove to be more of an obstacle than he expected.

Made as part of the Digital Media course TNM088 at Linköping University.

David Styrbjörn: Engine/Lead Programmer 
Emil Bertholdsson: Art & Graphics 
Linus Karlsson: SFX & Music
Max Benecke: Level Design & Secondary Programmer
Viktor Carlsson: Level Design/Implementation & Secondary Programmer 

Trailer: 

Gameplay video:Programmer note:

There is bugs and the game is only running on windows. Some of you may have virus protection that might react to this .exe, I couldn't find a way to sign the .exe to prevent this from happening so if that does occur you'll have to find a workaround. Sorry!
